title: Why does my battery drain 20% per hour and phone starts up automatically by itself if I turn it off?
content:
My phone keeps draining battey at around 20% per hour, even on battery saver mode. Charging is also acting up, or not working at all until you disconnect and reconnect the cord several times (used 4 different cords) 

Also, if I chose to turn my phone off, it will automatically turn it self back on. The only way it stays off is if I have the charger plugged in and it's charging. As soon as I take the cord out, it turns on automatically by itself.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
